TradingHistoryEligibility.Textual: Company/Directors/Owners/Partners must have a good credit history and have not been declared Bankrupt or had an Individual Voluntary Arrangement in the last 6 years from date of application.

Notes: Not available to Individuals

You can repay all or part of your loan at any time. There is no charge for repaying part of your loan early. However, if you repay the full amount of your loan early, you may be charged up to an additional 30 days of interest

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: Small business loan for customers who already have a Santander Business Current Account. Limited Companies etc. Pay back over 1-5 years. Borrow between £2000 and £25000
